review: Working great as of three weeks, I don't use the plug into the wall outlet, instead just use the USB port on the TV to run the power to it, and this is great so far,.. Firestick is playing well with Slingplayer where the Chrome would not play at all.. I don't use it for anything else just Sling, I think I have saved approx. $50 per month for the last 72 months, by just slinging the extra TV that sits in my friends basement and nobody watches..sure every once in a while a slow internet blip(I am talking minor blip), but instead of donating $7k to ATT Uverse, it is great to purchase the Slingbox for a one time charge of $200 and then only watch the Fox News or Fox Sports for a half hour each night.. really great with traveling because then can watch your local TV while out of the country
